void swap( path&amp; lhs, path&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|paths whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

{{unreviewed noexcept}}
